title: Little Big Man (CRS076)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Luke Cunningham first shared on the podcast in February of 2010 about a basketball career that was never meant to be.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin Allison, Luke Cunningham)
